  • About
This website uses cookies
We use cookies to personalise content and ads, to provide social media features and to analyse our traffic. We also share information about your use of our site with our social media, advertising and analytics partners who may combine it with other information that youve provided to them or that theyve collected from your use of their services.
Consent Selection
Show details

About
Cookies are small text files that can be used by websites to make a user's experience more efficient.

The law states that we can store cookies on your device if they are strictly necessary for the operation of this site. For all other types of cookies we need your permission.

This site uses different types of cookies. Some cookies are placed by third party services that appear on our pages.

You can at any time change or withdraw your consent from the Cookie Declaration on our website.

Learn more about who we are, how you can contact us and how we process personal data in our Privacy Policy.

Please state your consent ID and date when you contact us regarding your consent.

Frequently asked
questions

Can I test out Colossyan before signing up?

Yes! Create your first video with Colossyans free trial, or book a personal demo with our sales team to learn more.

How much does Colossyan cost?

Colossyan starts as low as $19 per month for 120 annual minutes of video.

How much does a Colossyan custom avatar cost?

Instant custom avatars are included in any active plan. However, studio custom avatars which are filmed professionally using a green screen are available as an add-on for $1000 per year.

Can I purchase additional minutes?

There is no way to purchase additional minutes while on the Starter plan. Consider upgrading to the Business plan to receive unlimited minutes instead.

Will my unused minutes roll over to the next month?

No. If you are under your video minute limit at the end of a billing period, your unused minutes will not roll over.

If I pay for an annual subscription, will I receive my entire minute allowance for the year all at once?

Yes! Youll receive all of your minutes for the year upon purchasing an annual plan, giving you the flexibility to use them whenever you need them.

Do my drafts count toward my minute allowance?

No. Only generated videos count toward your allowance feel free to create as many drafts as you like!

If I delete my generated videos, do I get my minutes back toward my allowance?

No, deleting generated videos will not result in a credit of minutes to your allowance.

Can I pause my Colossyan subscription?

Yes, you can pause your account for up to 2 months for free. Reach out to us in the chat to do so.

Can I cancel Colossyan at any time?

Monthly plans can be canceled at any time. Although annual plans can also be canceled, please note they are paid upfront for the year, so you wont be refunded for any unused months.

Is Colossyan a one-time payment?

No, access to Colossyan requires a recurring subscription. Starter and Business plans can be billed monthly or annually, and all Enterprise plans are billed annually.

Can I use Colossyan for free?

Yes! With Colossyans trial period, you can create your first AI video for free.

Didnt find the answer you were looking for?

Check out help center
